metadata.title: CVE-2020-35655 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
In Pillow before 8.1.0, SGIRleDecode has a 4-byte buffer over-read when decoding crafted SGI RLE image files because offsets and length tables are mishandled.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-35655` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-pil - 8.1.0-1
python3-pil.imagetk - 8.1.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pillow package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.1.0-1').
